# ReplaceTextOptions.AccordingToMargins property

Gets a default replace text options, according to the margins.

```csharp
public static ReplaceTextOptions AccordingToMargins { get; }
```

## Property Value

A [`ReplaceTextOptions`](../ReplaceTextOptions.md) instance that contains the default value of replace text options.
